work.company: CLO Virtual Fashion Inc., South Korea
highlights: Develop and implement prediction/decision support models using image/signal processing tools, statistical analysis and machine learning paradigms.

Design, adapt or opinionate online tools to facilitate the automation, accesibilty and exposure of research data and findings.
